events.description: Led and shaped the foundation, which had funded $77.6 billion in grants by 2023.
supporting_quotes: Melinda’s major role in shaping and leading the organization eventually came to an end. Following her divorce from Bill, she stepped down from her role as co-chair of the foundation in May 2024.

events.description: Launched an investment firm focused on social progress, including women’s political power, caregiving, paid family leave, women in technological innovation, and mental health support for young people.
supporting_quotes: In 2015, French Gates launched Pivotal Ventures, an investment firm aimed at funding organizations that support social progress.

events.description: Launched through Pivotal Ventures, this fund received $250 million from her $1 billion pledge to advance women’s rights and gender equality.
supporting_quotes: In October 2024, she announced $250 million of her pledge will go to the Action for Women’s Health fund, which she launched through Pivotal Ventures.

events.description: Pledged $1 billion of her own money to advance women’s rights and gender equality, with specific allocations to various organizations.
supporting_quotes: After resigning from the Gates Foundation, she pledged to donate $1 billion of her own money to advance women’s rights and gender equality.

events.description: Melinda worked as a product manager at Microsoft before leaving to focus on child-rearing and philanthropic efforts.
supporting_quotes: At the time, Melinda was working as a product manager at Bill’s company.
she decided to leave her job at Microsoft so she could focus on child-rearing and philanthropic efforts.

events.description: Released her first book, 'The Moment of Lift: How Empowering Women Changes The World', which shared lessons and stories from inspiring women and raised awareness to gender inquiries around the world.
supporting_quotes: In April 2019, French Gates released her first book, The Moment of Lift: How Empowering Women Changes The World, which shared lessons and stories from inspiring women and raised awareness to gender inquiries around the world.

events.description: Upcoming memoir titled 'The Next Day: Transitions, Change, and Moving Forward', expected to detail personal stories and meaningful moments from her life.
supporting_quotes: Her latest work is an upcoming memoir titled The Next Day: Transitions, Change, and Moving Forward, set to be released April 15, 2025. The book is expected to detail personal stories and meaningful moments from her life.

events.description: Investing, advocacy and philanthropic firm focused on closing the funding gap for female founders.
supporting_quotes: Melinda French Gates - Pivotal Ventures
Founder, Pivotal Ventures
French Gates also aims to close the funding gap for female founders through her investing, advocacy and philanthropic firm Pivotal Ventures.
